sn1.46:4.1: “It’s resounding with a group of nymphs,
sn1.46:4.2: but haunted by a gang of goblins!
sn1.46:4.4: How am I supposed to live like this?”
sn1.46:5.2: and it’s headed for the place called ‘fearless’.
sn1.46:5.4: fitted with wheels of skillful thoughts.
sn1.46:6.3: I say the teaching is the driver,
sn1.46:6.4: with right view running out in front.
